amendment.description: To improve section 115 of title I of division B with regard to Unemployment Insurance State consortia.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3812 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3812 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Hyde-Smith to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5902; text: CR S5902) To improve section 115 of title I of division B with regard to Unemployment Insurance State consortia.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3812 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Hyde-Smith to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3812 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
